Dress well. Do great things.

Do you wish you could wake up Monday morning and not have to worry about what to wear? Learn more... Fashion is constantly in flux. Trends come and go, and what's 'in' is forever shape-shifting. I offer a solid strategy that allows you to receive trends at your discretion, look awesome all the time, and get on with your life. Together, we create a streamlined, confident wardrobe that gets you out the door and ready to do great things.

Check out my video to learn about working with me.

Services for Men & Women

Closet Refresh

$475 & up

See your current closet in a whole new light. Learn which pieces are more successful than others (and why), what key items you're missing, and how to re-mix your wardrobe to get the most mileage out of what you have.

Learn more...

Wardrobe Revamp

$475 & up

Develop a more well-rounded, sophisticated wardrobe. Through an evaluation of your current closet, plus personal shopping assistance, you'll emerge from this process with an impeccably curated wardrobe that combines pieces you already own with carefully selected new items.

Learn more...

A La Carte

$475 & up

I create a made-to-order plan for your unique needs. This can include, but is not limited to, special event styling, a focus on dating and social wardrobe, travel and packing guidance, and shoe and accessories updates.

Learn more...

Virtual Services

$475 & up

Experience my signature virtual styling program. The perfect option if you live outside of NY or SF, or if you're looking for a more cost-friendly alternative to in-person services.

Learn more...

Client Spotlight

Shera, Media Marketing Manager

"Bryn really got me. She understood what I wanted—cool, easy(!) style—and helped me achieve it over and over again."

Lookbook

  • Shera needed help making her wardrobe more streamlined and cohesive to better serve her busy lifestyle. Together, we created a modern, functional collection that helps her look incredible from desk to dinner, to London, and back.

  • Shera's office environment is business casual, so she can add personality through pops of color and pattern, while still looking polished. A look that works just as perfectly for after-five drinks.

  • For more casual workdays, Shera wanted something besides boring blue denim. Hunter green jeans proved to be equally as versatile with a grown-up twist. And her navy blazer is softer than basic black.

  • A denim jacket was a key investment for Shera. She can use it all year long, plus it travels perfectly (and goes with everything). I taught her how to master the arm scrunch for a little more edge.

  • A fan of white jeans, Shera learned how to make them work beyond summer by pairing with a muted cardigan and lightweight scarf. Sandals make the whole ensemble more playful.

  • For a wedding in London, we found Shera a contemporary print she can dress up or down. Switching out heels for sandals, and adding that denim jacket makes this dress much more than a one-hit wonder.

My Story

As a personal stylist, my goal is to empower my clients through smart, sustainable style choices. I help both men and women understand the basics of great style, and how to achieve dress-and-go confidence every day.

I've worked in many areas of the fashion industry, from design to merchandising to online media, which has allowed me to gain an insider's perspective. From a personal standpoint, I know firsthand the effects of wardrobe anxiety and image-related frustrations. Pulling from both experiences, I'm able to offer my clients a sincere, professional, and lighthearted approach to mastering great style.

Since its launch in 2011, my business (formerly named The Re-Stylist) has served clients in both New York and San Francisco, and has been featured on several media outlets including eHow.com and Dr. Oz's YouBeauty. As of 2013, I now work with clients from all over the globe with my signature virtual styling program. I'd love to work with you!
